overview: The night is wild for those in search of a midnight hookup. Emma Hix knows the secret to her husband's success at work is her loyal submission in bed. Vanna's restless night ends when the man of her dreams lulls her to sleep with his magic touch.  Ember keeps her secret lover hidden in the shadows. Shy, little Emma meets a mysterious stranger who makes her face her demons while giving into temptation.
title: Late Night Hookups
